name: Citral Glue
description: Bred by Ethos Genetics, Citral Glue is a sativa-dominant cross of Ethosâ€™ own Citral Skunk with the ever-popular Original Glue. Buds are coated in red hairs and give off beautiful diesel, citrus, and skunk aromas. The Critical Skunk strain is reported to have uplifting and energetic effects, but its potency will keep the best of us stuck to the couch in cerebral and physical bliss.
